title: Signs Suggesting That You Might Need Glasses
description: These days, you have many choices regarding places to purchase glasses. A growingly popular method is through online retailers. That said, you may be reluctant to get glasses. title: Ratings: World Series Game 4 Delivers 8-Year Audience High
description: The New York Yankees’ crucial first win against the Los Angeles Dodgers on Tuesday night drew 16.3 million viewers on Fox alone, making it the most-watched World Series Game 4 since 2016 (when Cleveland-Cubs delivered 16.7 mil). The Game 4 audience peaked at 18.2 million, from 10:15-10:30 pm ET. Factoring in FOX Deportes and FOX […]
author: Matt Webb Mitovich

title: The Office Stars Reveal the Names of Michael and Holly’s Children That Were Cut From Series Finale
description: We now know the names of Michael Scott’s children on The Office… and they sound perfectly Michael Scott to us.
